faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Who can register on this platform?
faq.answer1: Our platform is designed for both delivery drivers looking to earn flexibly and restaurants aiming to expand their delivery reach.
faq.question2: What documents do I need to upload while registering?
faq.answer2: Drivers typically need to provide a valid ID, driving license, and vehicle details. Restaurants may need a business license and menu information.
faq.answer3: Yes, there's a one-time setup fee to help us verify your details and onboard you securely. No hidden charges after that!
faq.question4: How long does the approval process take?
faq.answer4: Once your form and payment are submitted, our admin team will review and approve your registration within 24–48 hours.
faq.question5: I own multiple restaurants. Can I register them all?
faq.answer5: Absolutely! You can register each outlet individually or contact our support team for bulk onboarding options.
faq.question6: What kind of support do you provide after onboarding?
faq.answer6: We offer partner support, including marketing help, logistics integration, and ongoing assistance via phone and email.
